title: Club Disappeared
body:
Other members of the club can still see me listed as the owner, but the club isn't visible on my end.
Club name is: Have a Good Weekend [HaGW]

Thanks!

replies.body: I'm having the same issue with the club chat I own. When I'm on my account that I used to create the club it says I'm not in the club, but when I go to an alternate account it says that the club still exists and my original account is still the owner.
I'm so happy this bug is effecting other leaders because i'm having the same problem.
I'm having the same issues. I own a club but i cant see it. Other members can but not me, anyone knows why?

With the clubs re-enable, there are a few hiccups. At the moment, we're dealing with these one-on-one in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so I strongly recommend submitting one.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Same here, this bug making me sad 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
